description: If Santa Claus looked like the King of All Muscle Daddies, Tomas Brand, and all of his elves looked like the strikingly handsome muscle twink, Klim Gromov, then I think every gay man on earth would continue to believe in them both! Santa Tomas’ special helper is Elf Klim, and he knows what Santa wants. Tomas loves his guys young and ready to take his raw dick, and Klim isn’t someone to deny Tomas his needs. When Santa Tomas is ready, Klim bends over to show off his perfect little hole; it’s so tight Tomas has to squeeze inside it like a chimney, and it takes a little while judging by Klim’s face. But once he’s in Tomas doesn’t stop fucking until he shoots his load!
title: Tomas Brand, Klim Gromov | Bareback Christmas
